name: Steve's HardCore WorldTour
description:
🌎Wishlist!🌍



In this HardCore WorldTour you will travel the world blasting your way back and forth and even between perspectives to save the Earth from a group of odd individuals unified to take over the world.
You will run into rappers, store clerks, lovers, and even disgruntled war mongers! Who better to take on this adventure than Steve, a gamer who can defeat half an army.

Features:
  • 2D Shoot 'em up game play where you can switch between 2D Lanes to avoid attacks (or be aggressive)
  • A "Momentum" Mechanic which allows you to go faster the better you play.
  • Several Locations around the globe with rich detail brought to life by parallax scrolling.
  • Slapping Good Music.
  • Amusing Dialogue.
  • All Hand-Drawn Art.
  • Steve.
